solution_line_template: He was able to use up {calories_per_minute} x {jogging_minutes} = <<{calories_per_minute}*{jogging_minutes}={calories_used}>>{calories_used} calories for jogging.
The net calorie intake of Will after jogging is {initial_calories} - {calories_used} = <<{initial_calories}-{calories_used}={net_calorie_intake}>>{net_calorie_intake}.
